page.title: 10 MY SISTER
page.content:
I HAVE A SISTER CALLED JULIE. MOST OF THE TIME I TALK TO HER.SHE IS 19 AND SHE BLONDE HAIR.EVERY NIGHT AT ABOUT 9 0'CLOCK I GO INTO HER ROOM AND LISTEN TO HER RECORDS.SHE HAS MOST OF THE TOP FIVE EVERY WEEK.TOGETHER SHE HAS ABOUT 250 RECORDS.SHE HAS A WARDROBE FULL OF CLOTHES.AND A DRAW FULL OF MAKE UP.MOST NIGHTS SHE GOES OUT TO DISCOS AND SOMES NIGHTS SHE GOES OUT FOR A DRINK.OFTEN SHE GIVES ME MONEY FOR SWEETS AND RECORDS.SHE IS NOT VERY TALL IN FACT SHE IS ONLY 5 FT 4.I AM NEARLY AS TALL AS HER WHEN I STAND NEXT TO HER.SHE HAS HER HAIR STYLED BY A LADY EVERY MONTH.I LIKE HER BECAUSE SHE IS ALWAYS NICE TO ME AND KIND.SHE TAKES ME TO TOWN WITH SOME OF HER FREINDS.
BY STEVEN ISAAC
